title: General
fullText:
RCD installation requirements, for Australia only, shall comply with Clauses 2.6.3.2.2 to 2.6.3.2.6.

Exceptions: These requirements need not apply to the following:
1. Final subcircuits supplied at ELV in accordance with Clause 7.5.
2. Final subcircuits supplied from a separated supply in accordance with Clause 7.4.
